THE EASTERN NEBRASKA VETERANS HOME (ENVH) IN BELLEVUE, NE, CURRENTLY OPERATES 30 DOMICILIARY BEDS AND 90 SKILLED NURSING BEDS.  ENVH REQUESTS FEDERAL GRANT ASSISTANCE TO INITIATE BED REPLACEMENT AND RENOVATION TO THE EXISTING ENVH FACILITY TO ACCOMPLISH THREE GOALS WHICH WOULD ENHANCE SERVICES FOR VETERANS: REPLACE THE 30 SEMI-PRIVATE DOMICILIARY BEDS WITH 24 PRIVATE BEDS; RENOVATE THE EXISTING FACILITY TO PROVIDE SPACE TO EXPAND SERVICES TO VETERANS WITH AN ADULT DAY HEALTH CARE (ADHC) MEDICAL MODEL PROGRAM AND REMODEL THE EXISTING DOMICILIARY NEIGHBORHOOD TO ACCOMMODATE 30 NEW SKILLED NURSING BEDS TO MEET THE NEEDS OF VETERANS IN THE AREA.
